title: place.terms
description:
A list of taxonomy terms used to categorize the [place](./place.json).

Terms are pre-defined and can be browsed in our [Terms](../docs/terms.md) guide.

A place requires at least one term, to define its type. (For example a museum, monument, ...)

items.description:
A taxonomy term used to categorize places.

All places require exactly one term of the `placetype` domain, and can optionally contain other terms.

When reading places, all properties will be available. When creating or updating places only the `id` is required to be included.

id.description: Unique id of the term. For example `0.50.4.0.0`.

label.description: Human-readable label of the term. Currently only available in Dutch. For example `Concert`.

domain.description: The domain of the term. Can be one of `placetype`, `theme`, or `facility`.
